aboutShort.title: DykesWhoTech
aboutShort.subtitle: Home for lesbians queer women & trans people in the tech industry
aboutShort.description: We are here to create a professional network, advance careers, and build a safe space where technology meets pride.

jobs.title: Jobs
jobs.description: Our events are where it all happens. We meet to learn, create, consult, and sometimes just to have a drink and feel at home.

support.title: Support Us & Join our proud partners
support.subtitle: Build the Future with Us
support.description: Join DykesWhoTech as a strategic partner and put your brand at the heart of the LGBTQ+ tech community. Connect directly with top-tier developers, designers, and entrepreneurs while demonstrating a tangible commitment to DEI. Whether through exclusive event engagement or recruitment-focused sessions, letâ€™s collaborate to make tech more representative and innovative.
